The value against which the product specification characteristic value is compared. For numeric values this is considered the minimum. For other values this value is the one used for comparison. Value type will be inherited from Pscv for comparison.

The measure unit of the value.

The category of the Usage Spec Characteristic
The catalog version under which this Usage Spec Characteristic is published
Defines whether an Usage Spec Characteristic is mandatory or not

itemtype.description: The allowed values for an Usage Spec Characteristic.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the Usage Specification Characteristic Value.
Name of the Usage Spec Characteristic Value
Description of the Usage Specification Characteristic Value.
Catalog Version on which the Product Spec Characteristic Value is published.
The value of the Usage Spec Characteristic Value
Defines whether this is the default value of this Usage Spec Characteristic Value.
The allowed values of the UsageSpecCharacteristicValue
Defines a range of possible values starting from this
Defines a range of possible values until this one
The type for the value (STRING, BOOLEAN, NUMERIC).

itemtype.description: Entity defining the categories for the Usage Specification Characteristics.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the Usage Characteristic Category.
The name of the Usage Characteristic Category
The description of the Usage Characteristic Category

itemtype.description: Service Usage Specification describing a type of service usage. A service usage represents any usage of service in its broadest meaning, for example or a usage of a service that realizes a product.
Product Usage Specification describing a type of product usage. Usages with these specifications will be generated by an Offering once this offering is instantiated in the Customer's Inventory
Atomic Product Usage Usage Specification
Composite Product Usage Specification
